name: WacDonalds
description:
WACDONALDS is a two player cooking game where chefs race to finish all orders in an incredibly tight kitchen. Work together by coordinating different dishes while making way room for each other to get to specific stations!

*Please note you need a BCI headset to play the game*

Instructions:

Player 1 uses the BCI headset to move 6 locations

Player 2 uses keyboard

    N  :Top Left

    V  : Middle Left

    B  : Bottom Left

    M : Top Right

    ,   : Middle Right

    .   : Bottom Right
